message:
This looks like a good opportunity in Egypt.

Via Mostafa Nageeb: if you don't know what affectiva does check these links
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9oVNP9zeEM
http://www.affdex.com/
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: COMPUTER VISION SCIENTIST (Cairo, Egypt)
caption: linkedin.com
description: Join the leaders in emotion recognition and develop emotion analytics powered by the largest repository of emotion data in the world. Affectiva is looking for a highly talented and motivated Computer Vision Scientist in Cairo, Egypt to contribute to its suite of emotion algorithms. The ideal candida...
